name: Cumin-Spiced Lamb Burgers
keywords: cumin, lamb, onion, main course, summer
recipeIngredient: 1 medium onion, peeled and cut into chunks

recipeInstructions.text: Start a charcoal or gas grill, or heat a broiler. The fire should not be too hot, and the rack should be about 4 inches from the heat source.

Combine all ingredients except lemon in a food processor, and pulse on and off until meat is ground. Shape into burgers, and grill about 8 minutes total for rare meat, turning once. Squeeze lemon juice over burgers and serve on toasted buns.
